name: Youtube in Black and Grey (October 2011) [OLD]
description:
This style is based on the Youtube style from Valacar (http://www.valacar.com/userstyles/). I just changed some things, that it will work with new youtube layout. The code is a bit untidy, but it works ;).

It only works with the old youtube styling.

I won't update this! Please look at the new version: http://userstyles.org/styles/27040
